thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Turkey's Borsa Istanbul to start buyback of its C class shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Turkey's Borsa Istanbul to start buyback of its C class shares
text:
ISTANBUL, Jan 16 (Reuters) - Turkeyâ€™s Borsa Istanbul has decided to start buying back its C class shares from willing stakeholders, the stock exchange said on Tuesday, in line with its plans toward a public offering.
In a written statement on its website, Borsa Istanbul said detailed information on the buyback would be sent to its C class shareholders via mail. C class shares constitute 9.40 percent of the company. (Writing by Ezgi Erkoyun; Editing by David Dolan)
